resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106534</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106534</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087607</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">CoSN K-12 Open Technologies Website</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">CoSN K-12 Öffnen Technologie-Web site</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">CoSN K-12 Ouvrent Le Site Web de Technologies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">CoSN K-12 Abre O Web site Das Tecnologias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">CoSN K-12 Apre Il Web site Di Tecnologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">CoSN Κ- 12 ανοικτός ιστοχώρος τεχνολογιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">CoSN K-12 Abre Web site De las Tecnologías</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Welcome to the website for the new CoSN K-12 Open Technologies Leadership Initiative.

The goal of this Web site is to help educators and technologists with the planning, evaluation, decision-making, and implementation processes associated with adopting Open Technologies in K-12.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Willkommen zur Web site für das neue CoSN K-12 
geöffnete Ziel der Technologie-Führung Initiative.The dieser Web 
site soll Erziehern und Technologen mit der Planung, der Auswertung, 
der Beschlußfassung und den Implementierungprozessen helfen, die mit 
dem Annehmen der geöffneten Technologien in K-12 verbunden sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La bienvenue au site Web pour le nouveau but 
ouvert de la conduite Initiative.The de technologies de CoSN K-12 de 
ce site de Web doit aider des éducateurs et des technologues 
avec la planification, l'évaluation, la prise de décision, et les 
procédés de mise en place liés à adopter des technologies ouvertes
dans K-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A boa vinda ao Web site para o objetivo aberto 
novo da liderança Initiative.The das tecnologias de CoSN K-12 deste 
Web site deve ajudar a educadores e a technologists com o planeamento,
a avaliação, a tomada de decisão, e os processos da execução 
associados com adotar tecnologias abertas em K-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il benvenuto al Web site per il nuovo obiettivo 
aperto di direzione Initiative.The di tecnologie di CoSN K-12 di 
questo Web site deve aiutare gli educatori ed i tecnologi con la 
progettazione, la valutazione, la risoluzione ed i processi di 
implementazione connessi con l'adozione delle tecnologie aperte in 
K-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υποδοχή στον ιστοχώρο για το νέο CoSN Κ- 12 
ανοικτή πρωτοβουλία ηγεσίας τεχνολογιών Ο στόχος αυτού του
ιστοχώρου είναι να ενισχυθούν οι εκπαιδευτικοί και οι τεχνικοί με
τον προγραμματισμό, την αξιολόγηση, τη λήψη αποφάσεων, και τις 
διαδικασίες εφαρμογής που συνδέονται με την υιοθέτηση των 
ανοικτών τεχνολογιών σε Κ- 12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La recepción al Web site para la nueva meta 
abierta de la dirección Initiative.The de las tecnologías de CoSN 
K-12 de este sitio del Web es ayudar a educadores y a 
tecnólogos con las hojas de operación (planning), la evaluación, la
toma de decisión, y los procesos de la puesta en práctica asociados 
a adoptar tecnologías abiertas en K-12.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087607</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106534</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/matters/cosn-k-12-open-technologies-website</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
